system_role: You are an expert in prompt engineering. Your task is to write alternative LLM prompt phrasings for the base instruction: '{bp_str}'. Each variation should instruct a language model (not a child) to generate a learning guide for third-grade students.
content_template: Generate EXACTLY {num_prompt_variations} prompt variations for the base instruction. Each variation must be an instruction to an LLM for generating a guide for third-grade students. Every variation must include the exact word “guide”, and either “third-grade” or “third-grader”. Do not use synonyms like 'manual', 'walkthrough', 'tutorial', or 'primer'. Output ONLY one JSON array with {num_prompt_variations} items, no more, no less. Format: ["prompt_variation_1", "prompt_variation_2", ...] Do NOT add explanations, headers, or formatting outside the JSON array.
